accuracy.description: How accurately the chatbot answers the question

criteria.5: Completely accurate with all key information correct
criteria.3: Partially accurate with some correct information
criteria.2: Mostly inaccurate with few correct points

completeness.description: How complete the answer is compared to expected information

criteria.4: Covers most expected information with minor gaps
criteria.3: Covers some expected information with notable gaps
criteria.1: Covers none of the expected information

sourceAccuracy.description: How accurately the chatbot references sources

criteria.5: All sources correctly referenced and relevant
criteria.1: No sources or completely incorrect sources

helpfulness.description: How helpful the answer is to the user

criteria.5: Extremely helpful, addresses user's needs completely
criteria.4: Very helpful, addresses most user needs
criteria.3: Somewhat helpful, addresses some user needs
criteria.2: Not very helpful, addresses few user needs

testInstructions.setup:
1. Load the chatbot with the FAQ data
2. Ensure semantic search is working
3. Test each question individually
testInstructions.execution:
1. Ask each test question
2. Evaluate the response using the provided metrics
3. Record scores and notes
4. Check source accuracy
testInstructions.reporting:
1. Calculate average scores per category
2. Identify areas for improvement
3. Document any issues with source handling
4. Provide recommendations for optimization
